alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Northern Lancaster; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fairfield and southwestern Lancaster Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Great Falls, or 12 miles north of Winnsboro, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Springdale, Elgin, Heath Springs, Andrew Jackson State Park, USC Lancaster, Irwin, Blackstock, Fishing Creek Reservoir, Arrowood Estates, Bell Town Fire Station, Camp Creek Fire Station, Antioch, Mitford, Kirk Air Base, Faith Christian School, Pleasant Hill, Lancaster Mill, McWhirter Airfield, and Bear Creek Park. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 42 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
